price: [به او می‌گوییم:] «نامه‌ات را بخوان. کافی است که امروز خود حسابگرِ خویش باشی».
arabic: ٱقۡرَأۡ كِتَٰبَكَ كَفَىٰ بِنَفۡسِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ عَلَيۡكَ حَسِيبٗا

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: iq'ra kitābaka kafā binafsika al-yawma ʿalayka ḥasīban
